00001 /** @file tuser.cpp
00002  *  @brief User Unit Test Implementation
00003  *  @author Efstathios Xatzikiriakidis
00004  *
00005  *  This is the unit test for the "User" class.
00006  */
00007 
00008 #include "tuser.h"
00009 
00010 QString gName     = QString ("Efstathios");      /**< User name value (test data). */
00011 QString gSurname  = QString ("Xatzikiriakidis"); /**< User surname value (test data). */
00012 QString gUsername = QString ("efst_user");       /**< User username value (test data). */
00013 QString gPassword = QString ("efst_pass");       /**< User password value (test data). */
00014 QString gRole     = QString ("Receptionist");    /**< User role value (test data). */
00015 
00016 /** User Constructor Test Method
00017  *  @brief This method tests the constructor of the "User" class.
00018  *  @author Efstathios Xatzikiriakidis
00019  */
00020 void TUser::testConstructor ()
00021 {
00022   User u (gName, gSurname, gUsername, gPassword, gRole);
00023 
00024   QVERIFY (u.getName ()     == gName     &&
00025            u.getSurname ()  == gSurname  &&
00026            u.getUsername () == gUsername &&
00027            u.getPassword () == gPassword &&
00028            u.getRole ()     == gRole);
00029 }
00030

00033  *  @author Efstathios Xatzikiriakidis
00034  */
00035 void TUser::testName ()
00036 {
00037   User u;
00038   u.setName (gName);
00039 
00040   QVERIFY (u.getName () == gName);
00041 }
